mapper.select: SELECT dev.id , dev.user_agent as "userAgent" , dev.os , dev.os_version as "osVersion" , dev.browser , dev.browser_version as "browserVersion" , dev.device , dev.device_type as "deviceType" , dev.orientation , dev.ip , modify_date as "date" FROM device_info dev WHERE dev.create_by = #{userID};

SELECT dev.id , dev.user_agent as "userAgent" , dev.os , dev.os_version as "osVersion" , dev.browser , dev.browser_version as "browserVersion" , dev.device , dev.device_type as "deviceType" , dev.orientation , dev.ip FROM device_info dev WHERE dev.create_by = #{userID} and dev.user_agent = #{userAgent};
mapper.delete: DELETE from device_info WHERE create_by = #{userID} and user_agent = #{userAgent};
